      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • physicsCalculations

        public static void physicsCalculations()
        Not really much physics in here, despite the name. Anyway it has 3 main functions:
         1) Kill Projectiles that go out of bounds, as well as the ones they were paired with, and the Rope they were connected with.
         2) Stick Projectiles to Targets when they collide;
         3) Do Game logic to deal with capturing pieces and checking for a win.

      • destroyOpposition

        public static void destroyOpposition()
        Marks problematic Projectiles for destruction.

      • tryDoGameMove

        public static boolean tryDoGameMove(Target target1,
                    Target target2)
        Attempts to claim pieces, and returns based on the success.
        Parameters:
        target1 - The Target claimed by the first Projectile.
        target2 - The Target claimed by the second Projectile.
        Returns:
        True if it was successful. False otherwise (if pieces are not in same row/already claimed/etc.).

      • degSin

        public static double degSin(double degrees)
        Parameters:
        degrees - The angle to calculate, in degrees.
        Returns:
        The sine of that angle.

      • degCos

        public static double degCos(double degrees)
        Parameters:
        degrees - The angle to calculate, in degrees.
        Returns:
        The cosine of that angle.
